entities.name: snape
entities.description: The person who is being spoken to by Minister, and is trying to discipline Harry. He is mentioned as 'Minister' in the text.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The student who has been given special treatment and is being disciplined by Snape. He is described as having led his friends into danger.

relationships.description: Snape is trying to discipline Harry for breaking school rules and putting himself in danger.
The Minister is speaking to Snape about the behavior of Harry.
